settings.text: The Stührling warranty is valid for a period of two years from the date of purchase. Stührling will repair or replace (at Stührling’s option) the movement of this timepiece free of charge if such movement proves to be defective in material workmanship under normal use. For quartz watches, the battery is covered by the warranty for a period of one year from the date of purchase. Terms and conditions apply.

settings.title: Within Warranty Period
settings.text:
Fee: A $30 shipping and handling fee is required.

Eligibility: For watches registered within 30 days of receiving it and within the 24-month warranty period.

Description: Secure comprehensive coverage for a wide range of issues including movement, battery, hands, dial, and more. Preserve the precision and elegance of your Stuhrling watch.

settings.title: Quartz Watches Out of Warranty
settings.text:
Fee: $45, including shipping and handling.

Eligibility: For Quartz watches outside the warranty period or not registered within 30 days of purchase.

Description: This service covers essential repairs such as battery replacements and movement issues, ensuring your Quartz watch operates flawlessly.

settings.title: Automatic Watches Out of Warranty
settings.text:
Fee: $65, inclusive of shipping and handling.

Eligibility: For Automatic watches that are no longer within the warranty period or were not registered within 30 days of purchase.

Description: Specializing in Automatic watches, our service offers detailed care for movement repairs, dial adjustments, and more, maintaining your watch’s perfect condition.

settings.title: Tourbillon Watches Out of Warranty
settings.text:
Fee: Starting at $100, with the final price provided after assessment. Includes shipping and handling.

Eligibility: For Tourbillon watches out of warranty or not registered within the initial 30 days.

Description: Expert care for your Tourbillon watch, including comprehensive movement servicing and detailed repairs, ensures your timepiece’s unmatched precision and craftsmanship.

settings.box_text:
Fee: A $30 return shipping and handling fee is required.

Eligibility: For watches registered within 30 days of receiving it and within the 24-month warranty period.

Description: Secure comprehensive coverage for a wide range of issues including movement, battery, hands, dial, and more. Preserve the precision and elegance of your Stuhrling watch.

Fee: $45, including shipping and handling.

Eligibility: For Quartz watches outside the warranty period and you don't not need to show proof of purchase.

Description: This service covers essential repairs such as battery replacements and movement issues, ensuring your Quartz watch operates flawlessly.

Fee: Starting at $65 depending on watch movement, includes shipping and handling.

Eligibility: For Automatic watches outside the warranty period and you don't not need to show proof of purchase.

Description: Specializing in Automatic watches, our service offers detailed care for movement repairs, dial adjustments, and more, maintaining your watch’s perfect condition.

Fee: Starting at $100, with the final price provided after assessment. Includes shipping and handling.

Eligibility: For Tourbillon watches out of warranty or not registered within the initial 30 days.

Description: Expert care for your Tourbillon watch, including comprehensive movement servicing and detailed repairs, ensures your timepiece’s unmatched precision and craftsmanship.

settings.text:
• We will inform you of any additional costs before proceeding with the repairs to ensure transparency and approval.
  • Terms and conditions apply
